author: Leggodt94
title: Mini Chopper!
review: I've always been a fan of helicopters, espiacially lego ones, so this set, although small, really did set right with me. You get a cool little nic-nac that's easy to build and blades that spin. Also includes cool clear pieces.

author: tkettle9719
title: Mini Chopper of Greatness
review:
This is one of the sets that was included in the Mr. Magorium set way back when. This model is quite fantastic, and is, in my opinion, tied with the jetplane overall.

Pros

  • -The propeller works with amazing ease. 
  • -The hole is worthless on one side of the set, but I fixed this problem by putting a Lego camera in it to make it a paparazzi chopper; either way, it attacks.
  • …

Cons

  • -The back propeller was a miss since it's just there.
  • -The choice of the side-studded brick on the side is confusing.
  • …

This is really a fine example of what all Lego sets should be like. I also like the simple and classic color scheme that this set has got going on. Buy this fine mini model.
